Pam / XFL.name: Redo XFL data.json
Pam / XFL.details: Remake XFL data.json with all images found in media, with consistent ID and updated image dimensions

OBB / SCG.name: Redo OBB data.json
OBB / SCG.details: Find all SCGs in OBB and add them to data.json

OBB / SCG.name: Convert Sen 3.0 Resource Group to 4.0 SCG
OBB / SCG.details: Take data from a Sen 3.0 OBB and make a 4.0 SCG with available data
OBB / SCG.input: 3.0 resources, spritesheet, other files part of resource group

JSON.name: Update All Coordinates in Worldmap JSON
JSON.details: Change the coordinates of all map pieces by a certain value
JSON.output: Worldmap with changed map piece coordinates

JSON.name: Organize Plant Files
JSON.details: Organize plant types, props, levels, and almanac data in a consistent order according to property sheets

JSON.name: Make Zombie and GI Templates
JSON.details: Make several copies of multiple level maker (or @CurrentLevel) zombie and GI templates

MISC.name: Level Error Checker
MISC.details: Compare a level to OBB files to check for potential errors
